name: coffee-beans-iac

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../cdk && npm install && cd ..
scripts.deploy:backend: cd cdk && npm run cdk deploy CoffeeCo-Backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd cdk && npm run cdk deploy CoffeeCo-Frontend
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.destroy:backend: cd cdk && npm run cdk destroy CoffeeCo-Backend
scripts.destroy:frontend: cd cdk && npm run cdk destroy CoffeeCo-Frontend
scripts.destroy:all: npm run destroy:frontend && npm run destroy:backend

description: Coffee Beans IaC project with AWS CDK
